pullrequest.title: Adding cppcheck and cpplint with codecheck target

content.raw:
I think this approach is clever, but I'm concerned about applying it to all runs of `cppcheck`. If for some crazy reason, `make codecheck` ever completely fails to find source files that were supposed to be there, this approach would hide that issue from us and leave us thinking that `make codecheck` is operating as expected.

Maybe we should just be adding source files to the example projects so that these tests are a better reflection of our assumptions about the structure and behavior of an ignition project.
